cards.text: It is a non-volatile memory hardware device that permanently stores and retrieves data on a computer. What is it? (Floppy disk / Hard disk)
What cable is used to connect a Hard Disk to a computer? (SATA/Power)
It is a type of storage media that is often used to store photos, videos, or other data on electronic devices. (Pen drive / Memory Card)
When did IBM create the first floppy disk? (1961 / 1971 / 1981)
Does a USB flash drive have any movable parts? (Yes / No)
It is a sequential storage media used to store data in archives. What is it? (SSD / HDD / Magnetic Tape)
What form of light is used to read data from common CDs? (Infrared / Laser / UV)
The secondary memory can store non-volatile data in computers. (True / False)
What is the full form of CD-ROM? (Compact Disk Read-Only Memory / Compact Drive Read-Only Machine)
A Blu-ray Disc can store up to _____ GB on a single layer. (16 / 32 / 25)

description: Answer according to the hints provided.
